about_the_game:
The mighty and warmhearted “Rona”, the main android of “METALLIC CHILD”, has joined The Lord of the Parties!

Let’s meet “Rona” of METALLIC CHILD, the new visitor of The Lord of the Parties!

“Rona” utilizes 3 types of weapons that changes over time; “Fist” for flurry of attacks, “Sword” for striking in a wide range of arc, and “Hammer” for its destructive power. Equipping higher rarity items allows you to cast multiple “Takedown” ultimates which can destroy hordes of enemies at once!

DLC Content
“Rona” has joined the fray as a playable character.
Limited “Rona” quests added.
“Rona” added to ENDLESS TOWER.

Let’s meet “Rona” of METALLIC CHILD, the new visitor of The Lord of the Parties!

“Rona” utilizes 3 types of weapons that changes over time; “Fist” for flurry of attacks, “Sword” for striking in a wide range of arc, and “Hammer” for its destructive power. Equipping higher rarity items allows you to cast multiple “Takedown” ultimates which can destroy hordes of enemies at once!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: window 7
  • Processor: Duo Core Intel or Amd
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb video memory
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or Amd
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
